alert.note: Alert for Decatur; Grady (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 09 at 2:32PM EDT until July 09 at 3:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 300 PM EDT FOR GADSDEN...WESTERN LEON...EASTERN DECATUR AND SOUTHWESTERN GRADY COUNTIES... At 231 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Bainbridge to 10 miles north of Havana to 10 miles southwest of Tallahassee Community College, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Florida State University, Bainbridge, Midway, Tallahassee Community College, Quincy, Havana, Florida A and M, Whigham, West Bainbridge, Doak Campbell Stadium, Gretna, Attapulgus, Climax, Lake Bradford, Leon Sinks, Douglas City, Gaither Community Center, Tallahassee Memorial Hosp and Florence. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
